features: Universal Fit for all cell phones including but not limited to the iPhone 8 Plus, Samsung Galaxy, Google Pixel. This clip ensures a hassle-free installation and usage experience.
Designed with a standard 1/4"-20 threading, this clip harmoniously interfaces with an array of accessories, such as monopods, selfie sticks, gorilla tripods, DSLR tripods, travel tripods, and more.
Our phone clip boasts extended dimensions, catering perfectly to all cell phones, particularly those with larger screens. Its adjustable width ranges from 2.3 to 3.85 inches (5.8-9.8 cm).
Crafted from premium quality plastic and cushioned with soft, protective rubber, this phone clip is designed to withstand the test of time while safeguarding your device.
Perfectly suited for capturing selfies and recording videos without the encumbrance of holding your device, for an effortlessly hands-free experience.
body.description: Cell Phone Clip for Tripod, Universal Expandable Attachment for Tripods, Phone Stands, Selfie Sticks, fits all iPhone and Android! Pack of 2. Say goodbye to convoluted setups! This clip ensures quick and easy installation, allowing you to dive straight into your creative endeavors. No more worries about slips or readjustments – just focus on capturing the perfect shot or scene. Whether it's a monopod, selfie stick, or a full-fledged tripod, our clip's universal threading opens up a world of possibilities for your photography and videography aspirations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does The Trick!
reviews.reviewText: I busted the iPhone holder on my self stick when it fell over. Thought I'd have to buy the whole thing over again but lo and behold, Amazon! Googled the part I needed and they had it and for under $10!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are great add-on for tripods
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these adapters to use with my Reflexx RLT lights. These lights are used for agility training and the mobile clip adapter allows me to hold these lights on any tripod that has a 1/4" screw-on adapter.These mobile clip adapters are very study and are able to be attached to the 1/4" screw-on adapter both on the end of the clip adapter or on the back. This makes it very versatile.If you're looking to avoid having to buy a whole new tripod so you can hold mobile phones or Reflexx RLT lights, these mobile phone adapters are perfect.Recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use this to mainly hold my phone while playing games. I haven’t used it at all as a selfie stick but still love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as intended Great Price
reviews.reviewText: In a world where our smartphones serve as our constant companions, having the right accessories to maximize their potential is essential. The Cell Phone Clip Tripod Attachment is one such accessory that has earned a permanent spot in my tech arsenal. This versatile gadget transforms your smartphone into a multipurpose tool, and the convenience it offers is simply unbeatable.The standout feature of this tripod attachment is its universal compatibility. It's designed to fit a wide range of phone sizes, making it suitable for virtually any smartphone on the market. The expandable design ensures a snug and secure fit, holding your phone in place without the risk of slipping or wobbling. Whether you have a compact phone or a larger phablet, this attachment has you covered.The utility of this attachment is boundless. It's ideal for use with phone stands, selfie sticks, tripods, and more. The ability to switch between these accessories effortlessly means that you can adapt to various situations and capture the perfect shot, whether you're on a solo adventure, traveling with friends, or recording memorable moments.The build quality of the attachment is durable and reliable. It's designed to withstand regular use and the rigors of travel, making it a dependable tool that won't let you down when you need it most.The convenience of having a 2-pack means that you have a backup attachment or can use both simultaneously for more dynamic shots. It's a practical addition for those who love to experiment with different angles and perspectives.Setting up your phone in the attachment is quick and effortless. There's no need for complex configurations or extra tools. It's a simple clip-and-go process that saves you time and allows you to focus on your creative endeavors.One minor consideration is that the attachment may cover a small portion of the phone's screen, depending on its design. However, this doesn't hinder functionality and is a small trade-off for the secure fit it provides.In conclusion, the Cell Phone Clip Tripod Attachment is a must-have for anyone who loves to capture moments with their smartphone. Its universal compatibility, adaptability to various accessories, durability, and the convenience of a 2-pack make it an invaluable addition to your tech gear. Whether you're a solo traveler, a social media content creator, or someone who appreciates the versatility of your smartphone, this attachment empowers you to take your photography and videography to the next level. It's a versatile tool that enhances your creative capabilities and ensures you're always ready to capture the perfect shot. Highly recommended!
